bios.title: Faculty Advisor
bios.excerpt: Pronouns: she/her If it has to do with getting around or to campus without driving alone, its part of Abbys job. She leads the overall strategy, administration and expansion of the Active Transportation Plan and existing Transportation Demand Management (TDM) programs while overseeing the implementation of new sustainable transportation initiatives. Abby received her B.S. in […]
